messages.messageBody:
Hello and konnichi-wa members,

thank you very much for so many mails about my favourite interest.

I´m a member of the NBTHK-European-Branch and collecting fine japanese swords.

When I finished our homepage I will tell you.

Best regards to all

Mike




Wie weit entfernt
ist vom Getue des Erdenlebens
der Baum der Wildkirsche?

Furumaru
